item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, November 18, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Biden allows Ukraine to strike Russia with US-made long-range missiles
2. Singapore oil trader sentenced to 17 years for ‘cheating’ HSBC over $112mn
3. Trump expands search for Treasury secretary
4. Stealth sackings: why do employers fire staff for minor misdemeanours?
5. [Opinion] Trump’s victory represents a historic protest vote, no more and no less
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, November 18, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
